Detailed Description

GLIB replacement for libhal, the extra stuff.

Author:
Richard Hughes <richard@hughsie.com>
Date:
2005-10-02
This module uses the functionality of glibhal-main to do some clever things to HAL objects, for example dimming the LCD screen.

Definition in file glibhal-extras.c.
